description: Swarm A vector (VFM) and scalar (ASM) magnetic field measurements interpolated at 1Hz rate.
terms: This dataset is provided by the European Space Agency and it is subject to terms condition described in https://vires.services/data_terms.

vires:parameters.name: Timestamp
vires:parameters.description: Time stamp

vires:parameters.name: Latitude
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Latitude

vires:parameters.name: Longitude
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Longitude

vires:parameters.name: Radius
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Radius

vires:parameters.name: B_FGM1
vires:parameters.description: calibrated magnetic vector from FGM1, in instrument frame

vires:parameters.name: B_FGM2
vires:parameters.description: calibrated magnetic vector from FGM2, in instrument frame

vires:parameters.name: B_FGM3
vires:parameters.description: calibrated magnetic vector from FGM3, in instrument frame

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC1
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM1, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC2
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM2, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC3
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM3, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, 5 sample (i.e. 20 second) robust average of all 3 FGM

vires:parameters.name: F
vires:parameters.description: magnetic field intensity determined from B_NEC

vires:parameters.name: B_mod_NEC
vires:parameters.description: CHAOS-6 model field (core, crust + magnetosphere), in NEC (North, East, Center) frame

vires:parameters.name: q_NEC_CRF
vires:parameters.description: Quaternion, transformation: NEC <- CRF

vires:parameters.name: q_error
vires:parameters.description: experimental error indicator of attitude given in Quaternion q_NEC_CRF. Bad attitude if > approx 40

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_Model
vires:parameters.description: CHAOS magnetic model

vires:parameters.name: F_Model
vires:parameters.description: CHAOS magnetic model, field intensity

vires:parameters.name: F_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: magnetic field intensity determined from B_NEC, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, 5 sample (i.e. 20 second) robust average of all 3 FGM, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC1_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM1, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC2_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM2, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC3_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM3, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, CHAOS magnetic model residual

title: CS_MAG
